name: Black Lodge - The Art of David Lynch
name_original: Black Lodge - The Art of David Lynch
description:
This game is about the art of one most great cinematography artist, David Lynch. The game is a journey inside of his work. The player walk between three work films scenario: Twin Peak, Blue Velvet and Erazorhead, some like a Theatre stage. Searching way of exit of this dream.

Equipe Team:

- Philippe A. Lepletier (Artist)

- Wagner Tavares (Programmer)

- Homero Colaço (Sound Maker)
